item.description:
Rock with "Pandemonium with Teresa Rodriguez" - Elizabeth Park - FREE

Please join us for a fun, BEAUTIFUL evening of "FREE Live Outdoor Music" on Elizabeth Park's Rose Garden Lawn this WEDNESDAY, 08/15. Gather @ 6:00 (show 6:30 - 8:00).

>>> LOOK FOR: a large "Cheers" COCKTAIL-Shaped BALLOON (see this MeetUp's photo). Also, Al R. will be there with his four orange traffic cones.
>>> We tend to group farther back, nearer the Rose Garden than to the stage. This is a combined gathering of MeetUp & Single Event social networking groups, typically 12-24 party together each time (spontaniously, with or without RSVP's), sometimes many more! New friends are always welcome!

>>> BYOB and snacks/Picnic dinner, if you'd like... bring extra for the post-party that typically ensues locally. As always, be discreet, don't litter, and drive responsibly!

>>> To cut down on email updates, please check back here by 3PM the day of the event for any updated info.

See you there!

- Rob

Rob Pudney

***
Elizabeth Park
1555 Asylum Avenue
Rose Garden Lawn
West Hartford, CT 06107
860-231-9443

Please note, per Elizabeth Park's web site, "Pandemonium" is being "mis-"advertised as "50's music", however, in checking out their web site, they are actually quite a contemporary, rockin' band full of energy that'll get the crowd dancing!

Pandemonium is a four-piece band that's been entertaining crowds all over the Tri-State area since 2001. Performing at nightclubs, colleges, casinos, ski lodges, corporate parties, fundraisers, festivals, weddings...you name it, they've played it. With a library of literally hundreds of songs, PDM can cover anything from Jackson 5 to Bon Jovi, Blondie to No Doubt, The Beatles to AC/DC, Katrina and the Waves to Kelly Clarkson...Guns & Roses, Green Day, Poison, Blink 182, Van Halen...old...new...basically ANYTHING that people can sing along with and jam to. For latest schedule and news updates, visit: www.pdmrocks.com.

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
